answers.text: Centre for the Study of Ancient Documents

context: One such institution is the <a0_0>Centre for the Study of Ancient Documents<a0_0/> (CSAD) founded by and located centrally at <a1_0>Oxford University<a1_0/>, <a2_0>Great Britain<a2_0/>. Among its many activities CSAD numbers "a long-term project to create a library of digitised images of Greek inscriptions." These it arranges by region. The Egypt and the Near East region besides Egypt includes Cyprus, Persia and Afghanistan but not Asia Minor (a separate region).
